message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll love it!
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $70?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll come down to $90. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $90 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $75. This is my final offer.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'll meet you at $82.50, and that's my final counteroffer.
